meanings.definition: To pour out in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: She outpoured her emotions during the heartfelt speech.
meanings.sent2: The rain outpoured from the dark clouds, drenching the streets.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing cup outpoured its contents, creating a mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: The volcano outpoured molten lava, engulfing everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The dam burst, and water outpoured with tremendous force, flooding the valley.

meanings.sent1: The outpoured milk filled the entire bowl to the brim.
meanings.sent2: The outpoured love and support from the community touched her heart.
meanings.sent3: The outpoured enthusiasm of the fans made the stadium come alive.
meanings.sent4: The outpoured generosity of the donor was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The outpoured joy on their faces was contagious, spreading to everyone around.
